question: A man and his wife plan for a dinner but both are in different places. The probability  of man arriving first to the spot is 2/3 and his wife is 1/3.Find the probability that wife reaches the spot first?

Abi can produce 1,000 pens in 4 hours, Brindha can produce the same number of pens in 5 hours while Chetan can produce them in 6 hours. All the three are started at 9 a.m. While Abi is closed at 10 am and the remaining two complete the work. Approximately at what time will the work be finished?

Two trains are running on parallel lines in the same direction at speeds of 40 kmph and 20 kmph respectively. The faster train crosses a man in the second train in 36 seconds. The length of the faster train is

Due to irregular working habits of Ramachandran, his salary was reduced by 20% but after some months his salary was increased to the original salary. What is the percentage increase in salary of Ramachandran?

Eight persons A, B, C, D, E, F, G and H are the sitting in the circular table all facing the centre of the table. All the people are not necessary to be in the same order. A sits second to the left of B. Only two people sit between G and F, who is an immediate neighbour of B. More than two persons sit between H and D in both clockwise and anticlockwise direction. D is not an immediate neighbour of A. E is not an immediate neighbour of G. A does not faces E. E does not sits second to the right of F.

A postman was returning to the post office which was in front of him to the north. When the post office, was 100 m away from him, he turned to the left and moved 50 m to deliver the last letter at the Shanti villa. He, then moved in the same direction for 40 m, turned to his right and moved 100 m. How many metres was he away from the post office?

From his house, Sourav started his journey towards West. After traveling a certain distance he turned to his left and after travelling a certain distance he turned to his right to reach the office. In which direction is the office with respect to his house?
The difference of 13% and 12% of a sum in one year is Rs.110. Then what is the sum?
The number of arrangements of the letters of the word SALOON, if the two Oâ€™s do not come together, is
A student has to obtain 33% of the total marks to pass. He got 125 marks and failed by 40 marks. The maximum marks are :
Vinay comes across a riddle, which says There is one particular number which can divide a any two digit number and the reverse of the same two digit number. What will be that number ?
TIn how many different ways can the letters of the word KINETIC arranged so that the vowels never come together?
A man can row with the stream at the rate of 20 kmph and against the stream at 5 kmph. The man's rate in still water is
Rahul put his timepiece on the table in such a way that at 6 P.M. hour hand points to North. In which direction the minute hand will point at 9.15 P.M. ?
Showing the man receiving the prize, Saroj said, He is the brother of my uncle's daughter. Who is the man to Saroj ?
In a certain code language COMPUTER is written as RFUVQNPC. How will MEDICINE be written in that code language?
What will be next in the given series. APK, BQL, CRM, DSN, ....

Greg buys cattle for 15Rs. In exactly one year he sells it for 20Rs. After one year again he buys the same cattle at 30Rs. and this time sells it for 40Rs. What is the overall profit percent for Greg in this transaction?
The average marks of Suresh in 10 papers are 80. If the highest and the lowest scores are not considered, the average is 81. If his highest score is 92, find the lowest score.
The probability of selecting good orange randomly from a heap of 525 guavas is 0.2. What is the number of good orange in the heap?

Lalit is very concerned about savings and doesn't spend much for most of the daily activities, He went to shopping for his birthday where he spent a lumpsum amount. At the end of shopping he had $ 3600 which is actually 40 % of the money he had for shopping. How much money did he take along with him?

Mike sees a pair of gloves for Rs.120 in the winter sale, which also provides a discount of 10%. Mike has got 900 with him of which 18Rs. has to be spent for bus fare, so he decides to spend the remaining amount with him. Then how many pair of gloves can he buy?
Elon covers 3/20 of the total journey by his Tesla cybertruck. 1/10 by Model X car and the remaining 10 km on foot. His total journey in km is ________
Ram has 16 fruits out of which 4 of them are bad. If he picks two fruits one after the other with replacement, then what is the probability that he chooses two good fruits?
A group consists of 4 girls and 7 boys. In how many ways can a group of 5 members be selected if the team has no girls?
The price of a computer and a television set is in the ratio 7:3. If a computer costs Rs.38000 more than the television set, then what is the price of the television set?
A mixture contains milk and water in the ratio 12 : 5. On adding 12 litres of water, the ratio of milk to water becomes 9 : 4. the quantity of milk in the mixture is:
In a certain code, WATCH is written as GBSZV. How is CLOCK written in that code ?
Find out the wrong number. 1, 64, 343, 1000, 2177

The outer border of width 1 cm of a cube is painted violet on each side and the remaining space enclosed by this 1 cm path is painted brown. This cube is now into 125 smaller cubes of each side 1 cm. the smaller cube so obtained are now separated.How many smaller cubes have all the surfaces uncolored?

Eight persons N, O, P, R, S, T, U, and V sit around a circular table. Some of them face inside the center while some face outside the center. T sits third to the right of N, who faces inside the center. V sits second to the left of T. Both P and S sit immediate left to each other. two persons sit between V and R. U sits third to the left of O. U faces the same direction as S but opposite to O. P sits second to the left of V. P and R faces the same direction but opposite to T.How many persons face towards the center?
A sum of Rs.550 was taken as a loan. This is to be paid back in two equal instalments. If the rate of interest is 20% compounded annually, then the value of each instalment is :

Lavish is known for his negotiating which he derives from his father. He bought a power bank, which he got at 20% less than the original price. Now he planned to sell the same power bank with a profit of 50% from the price he gave while buying. What is the percentage profit earned by Lavish from the original price?

At an election between two candidates, the candidate who got 66 % of the votes casted won by 3072 votes. Find the total number of the voters on the voting list if 80% people casted their vote and there were no invalid votes.

Arhaan took a loan of a certain amount from a bank at 20% annual CI for 2 years and lent the whole amount of Karan at 25% SI for 2 years. If he earns Rs. 2400 in this process, then what is the borrowed amount by Arhaan?
Which of the following can be a number divisible by 24?

A laundry bag has got 3 violet colored garments, 5 blue colored garments and 4 white colored garments. The laundry dryer will choose only 3 garments in a given time slot. If he draws 3 random garments from this bag, then what is the probability that exactly one of them is white ?

A 5-digit number has a peculiar characteristic wherein the product of the first two digits with the last two digits minus the central digit results in a string that consists same numbers in all the digits. Which of the following option satisfies this condition?
If A had worked alone he would have taken 63 hours to do the task. What is B's share, if A and B work together on a task finishing it in 36 hours and they get paid Rs. 5,950 for it?

Annual incomes of Vasisht and Rohith is in the ratio of 5:4 who work in different organisations, whereas, their spending ratio is 4:3 respectively. At the end of 1 year, Vasisht and Rohith save Rs. 400 and Rs. 500, then what will be the income of Vasisht is ?
A and B are sisters. C and D are brothers. A's son is D's brother. How is B related to C?
The students in 3 classes are in the ratio of 3:4:5. If 15 students are added to each class, the ratio becomes 6:7:8. Find the total no of students in all the 3 classes now.

A shopkeeper in a town attracts a lot of customers to his shop by giving three successive discounts to the customers instead of the usual one time discount. On a festival season, he decided to give three discounts of 20%, 10% and another 5% successively. This successive discounts that he has given will be equal to a single discount of  _______% ?
On compounding half-yearly, the interest accumulated at the end of 1.5 years on a principal of Rs. 1000 is ______ . (Assuming ROI as 20)
The average of 15 numbers is 15. If the average of first five numbers is 14 and that of other 9 numbers is 16, then find the middle number.
In a 500 meter race, the ratio of the speeds of two contestants A and B is 3:4. A has a start of 140 m, then

Bhuvana and Lathika had applied for an interview for a post of Developer Lead in XYZ organization. If the probability of Bhuvana getting selected is 1/7 and probability of Lathika being selected is 1/5, then what is the probability of both of them not being selected ?

The average temperature for Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday was 48 degrees and for Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday and Friday was 46 degrees. If the temperature on Monday was 42 degrees, find the temperature on Friday.
